thread.title: Report Card: Grading the Bengals’ performance vs. the Seahawks
thread.title_full: Report Card: Grading the Bengals’ performance vs. the Seahawks

title: Report Card: Grading the Bengals’ performance vs. the Seahawks
text:
Posted: 10:19 p.m. Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015 Report Card: Grading the Bengals’ performance vs. the Seahawks Staff Writer CINCINNATI — 
It was the smallest victory of the year in terms of margin, but it was the largest in terms of significance as the Cincinnati Bengals rallied from 17 points down in the fourth quarter to beat Seattle 27-24 in overtime Sunday afternoon at Paul Brown Stadium. 
Several players talked about winning a game in that fashion being a greater accomplishment than just taking control early and coasting, and they would know best. If there was just one grade to hand out for the overall performance, it certainly would be a solid ‘A’ with a little gold star next to it. Continue Reading Read the complete story...
